notes: Conditional logic via Python control flow

components.name: Extract Data from data.gouv.fr
components.description: Extracts raw data from multiple French government data sources in parallel

upstream_policy.description: All data sources must be successfully extracted

components.name: Download City Geographic Coordinates
components.description: Downloads city geographic coordinates mapping data

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful extraction of other data sources

components.name: Fetch Nuclear Power Plant Data
components.description: Fetches nuclear power plant metadata and extracts CSV data

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful extraction of other data sources

components.name: Fetch Thermal Power Plant Data
components.description: Fetches thermal power plant metadata and extracts CSV data

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful extraction of other data sources

components.name: Fetch Death Records
components.description: Fetches death record metadata and downloads multiple death data files

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful extraction of other data sources

components.name: Create Death Table
components.description: Creates the target database table for death records

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful creation of other tables

components.name: Create Power Plants Table
components.description: Creates the target database table for power plants

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful creation of other tables

components.name: Load Death Records to Redis
components.description: Loads death records from ingestion files into Redis with deduplication

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful extraction of death records

components.name: Cleanse Death Data
components.description: Transforms death records with geographic mapping and date formatting

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful loading of death records to Redis

components.name: Cleanse Power Plant Data
components.description: Cleans and transforms power plant data with column standardization

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful extraction of power plant data

components.name: Generate Plant Insertion Queries
components.description: Generates SQL insertion queries for power plant data

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful cleansing of power plant data

components.name: Check Death Data Emptiness
components.description: Checks if death data processing produced valid SQL queries

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful cleansing of death data

components.name: Store Deaths in PostgreSQL
components.description: Executes death data insertion into PostgreSQL

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful generation of death insertion queries

components.name: Staging End
components.description: Skips death data insertion when no valid records

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful check of death data emptiness

components.name: Store Plants in PostgreSQL
components.description: Loads power plant data into PostgreSQL

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful generation of plant insertion queries

components.name: Clean Temporary Death Files
components.description: Cleans up temporary death data from Redis and file system

upstream_policy.description: Depends on successful insertion of death records

name.constraints: Must be a unique identifier for the pipeline

batch_window.description: Batch window parameter name (e.g., ds, execution_date)

partitioning.description: Data partitioning strategy (e.g., daily, hourly, monthly)

depends_on_past.description: Whether execution depends on previous run success

dataset_ids.description: Multiple dataset IDs for data extraction
dataset_ids.constraints: List of dataset IDs from data.gouv.fr

ingestion_directory.description: Directory for storing raw CSV/JSON files

city_geo_dataset_url.description: URL for city geographic coordinates mapping data

output_file.description: Output file path for city geographic coordinates

nuclear_dataset_id.description: Dataset ID for nuclear power plant metadata

output_json.description: Output JSON file for nuclear power plant metadata

output_csv.description: Output CSV file for nuclear power plant data

thermal_dataset_id.description: Dataset ID for thermal power plant metadata

output_json.description: Output JSON file for thermal power plant metadata

output_csv.description: Output CSV file for thermal power plant data

death_dataset_id.description: Dataset ID for death record metadata

output_json.description: Output JSON file for death record metadata

max_resource.description: Maximum number of resources to fetch

sql_file.description: SQL schema file for creating the death table
SQL schema file for creating the power plants table

redis_list_key.description: Redis list key for death records

imported_files_key.description: Redis key for tracking imported death files

redis_list_key.description: Redis list key for death records

city_geo_file.description: File path for city geographic coordinates

output_sql_file.description: Output SQL insertion queries file for deaths table

input_files.description: Input files for power plant data
input_files.constraints: List of thermal_plants_.csv and nuclear.csv files

output_directory.description: Output directory for cleaned power plant data

input_files.description: Input files for power plant data
input_files.constraints: List of cleaned thermal and nuclear plant CSV files

output_sql_file.description: Output SQL insertion queries file for power plants table

sql_file.description: SQL insertion queries file for death data
SQL insertion queries file for death data
SQL insertion queries file for power plant data

redis_list_key.description: Redis list key for death records

sql_files.description: Temporary SQL query files to delete
sql_files.constraints: List of temporary SQL query files

INGESTION_DIRECTORY.description: Directory for storing raw CSV/JSON files

STAGING_DIRECTORY.description: Directory for storing cleaned CSV files

sources: data.gouv.fr API for thermal plants, nuclear plants, death records, and city geo data
static.data.gouv.fr API for city geo data
sinks: PostgreSQL database for storing death records and power plant data
